sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row align-content="center" justify="center">
    <v-col cols="4">
      <v-autocomplete
          v-model="value"
          :items="items"
      ></v-autocomplete>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="12" align-content="center" class="text-center">
      <v-card pt="4" mt="4">
        <template v-for="(seans, index) in seans_table">
          <template v-if="seans.film.title === value">
            <v-btn :key="index" @click="pick_sall(seans.sala, seans)">
              {{seans.date}}
              {{seans.time}}
            </v-btn>
          </template>
        </template>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
    <template v-if="sall.rows>1">
      <v-col cols="12">
        <SallPage
            :Sala="sall"
            :Seans="picked_seans"
        ></SallPage>
      </v-col>
    </template>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import SallPage from "./SallPage.vue";
import { FILMS, SEANS } from "@/components/DATA/database";

export default {
  name: "ShopPage",
  components: { SallPage },
  data: () => ({
    films_table: FILMS,
      seans_table: SEANS,
      value: null,
      sall: {
          id: 0,
          rows: 0,
          columns: 0
      },
      picked_seans: null,
  }),
  computed: {
    items() {
      return this.films_table.map(film => {
        return film.title;
      });
    }
  },
    methods: {
        pick_sall(picked_sall, seans) {
            this.sall = picked_sall
            this.picked_seans = seans
        }
    }
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
